description: While it's a bit like throwing some coins into a well and making a wish, I'm not going to stop you if you want to give it a shot to win a Steam Deck, or a big bundle of games if you manage to find a golden egg in the Fanatical Mystery Egg Bundle.
title: Win a Steam Deck OLED or a golden egg game bundle in Fanatical's Mystery Egg Bundle

description: A freshly squeezed cup of Proton Experimental was released today by Valve containing fixes for multiple games on Steam Deck and Desktop Linux like Overwatch 2.
title: Proton Experimental brings initial D3D12 for OpenVR, fixes Overwatch 2 crashes

description: Dambuster Studios and Deep Silver have now finally released Dead Island 2 on Steam, after previously being Epic Games exclusive and they're boasting about Steam Deck support.
title: Dead Island 2 arrives on Steam boasting of Steam Deck support

description: Finally! Valheim is getting close to the release of the big Ashlands update, and now you can go and actually test it.
title: Ashlands update for Valheim has a new trailer and public test is live

description: Embracer Group have announced that after being the cause of many job losses, shutting down developers and selling some off - they're now splitting into three companies.
title: Embracer Group splitting into three companies

description: Sunshine when paired up with Moonlight offers a great way to stream games from your PC to pretty much any other system, and the latest release v0.23.1 should work better on Linux now.
title: Sunshine game streaming update has frame timing improvements for Linux

description: A game that is something of a homage to the days of the Sega Saturn, Walaber Entertainment who created the fun JellyCar series have announced Parking Garage Rally Circuit.
title: Parking Garage Rally Circuit coming by dev of JellyCar with Linux / Steam Deck support

description: A long time coming after initially going live back in December 2013, developer The Fun Pimps has now announced that 7 Days to Die is going to be leaving Early Access.
title: Over 10 years later 7 Days to Die is going to leave Early Access

description: Supporting the Palestine Children's Relief Fund charity, the Palestinian Relief Bundle is live on itch.io.
title: A big Palestinian Relief Bundle is live on itch.io

description: It seems nothing is safe from bogus websites and scams, with someone setting up a fake website for Proton-GE / GE-Proton.
title: PSA: someone set up a fake Proton-GE website
